title: As a BOC user I want to view the Registration Reviews widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in with permission to view the Registration Reviews widget
AND user navigate to the International dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user click on the International dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN  BOC users see a Registration Reviews widget directly under the Registration Admin widget on the L1 Reg tab of the International dashboard. 
AND The widget follows the provided data discovery and wireframe.
AND The widget's default population is all REGISTERED profiles (no unregistered profiles display) with an Eligible to Sign date between the selected date range. 
AND The widget should ONLY display registration profiles that WERE NOT registered by the logged in user. 
AND The Review header filter should default to Review 1, which means that the widget should ONLY display profiles that do not yet have a completed First Review.

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_reviews

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Registration+Reviews+widget+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a BOC user I want to update multiple players' First Review using the Registration Reviews widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is logged in with permission to view the Registration Reviews widget 
AND user navigate to the Registration Reviews widget
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Registration Reviews widget with the header filter set to "Review 1"
custom_expected:
THEN there should be an action button on the widget that reads "Update Review 1". 
AND This button should enable when one or more profiles is selected. 
AND Clicking this button should open a menu that allows the user to select what Registration Status to set the selected profile(s) to (should match the values available from the profile). 
AND If the user selects "Verified" outside of the verification window for first reviews, display the appropriate error.
OR Otherwise, when the user selects the registration status, update all of the selected profiles' First Review to the selected value. 
AND Display a blue successful save notification that details how many Reviews were updated.
AND Each profile should have their Review 1 information set appropriately. 
AND The widget should reload so that those profiles no longer display with the Review 1 header filter set IF the review 1 was set to Verified or Pre-Verified.

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_reviews

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Registration+Reviews+widget+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a BOC user I want to update multiple players' Second Review using the Registration Reviews widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is logged in with permission to view the Registration Reviews widget 
AND user navigate to the Registration Reviews widget
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Registration Reviews widget with the header filter set to "Review 2"
custom_expected:
THEN the population of players should be all of those players that have already had Review 1 populated with a status of Verified or Pre-Verified, and have an "open" Review 2 field on their player profile (has not yet been set to Verified). 
AND When viewing the Registration Reviews widget with the header filter set to "Review 2",  there should be an action button on the widget that reads "Update Review 2". 
AND This button should enable when one or more profiles is selected. 
AND Clicking this button should open a menu that allows the user to select what Registration Status to set the selected profile(s) to (should match the values available from the profile). 
AND When the user selects the registration status, update all of the selected profiles' Second Review to the selected value. 
AND Display a blue successful save notification that details how many Reviews were updated.
AND Each profile should have their Review 2 information set appropriately. 
AND The widget should reload so that those profiles no longer display with the Review 2 header filter set IF the review 2 was set to Verified.

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_reviews

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Registration+Reviews+widget+-+Data+Discovery

title: As a BOC user I want to update multiple players' Third Review using the Registration Reviews widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is logged in with permission to view the Registration Reviews widget 
AND user navigate to the Registration Reviews widget
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Registration Reviews widget with the header filter set to "Review 3"
custom_expected:
THEN the population of players should be all of those players that have already had Review 1 populated with a status of Verified or Pre-Verified, and have already had Review 2 populated with a status of Verified and have an "open" Review 3 field on their player profile that is NOT set to Verified. 
AND When viewing the Registration Reviews widget with the header filter set to "Review 3",  there should be an action button on the widget that reads "Update Review 3". 
AND This button should enable when one or more profiles is selected. 
AND Clicking this button should open a menu that allows the user to select what Registration Status to set the selected profile(s) to (should match the values available from the profile). 
AND When the user selects the registration status, update all of the selected profiles' Third Review to the selected value. 
AND Display a blue successful save notification that details how many Reviews were updated.
AND Each profile should have their Review 3 information set appropriately. 
AND The widget should reload so that those profiles no longer display with the Review 3 header filter set IF the review 3 was set to Verified (these profiles will no longer appear in the widget at all).

Wireframe:
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=registration_reviews

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Registration+Reviews+widget+-+Data+Discovery

title: Registration Reviews widget - Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for Registration Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with Registration Widget
custom_expected:
THEN Users without the permission should not see the widget on the L1 Reg tab. 
AND Only users with international amateur profile editors permissions should see the "Update" button on the widget at all. 
AND Add the new LDAP to test users 52 and 75.
